name: Easy Donation for Woocommerce
author: IT Path Solutions

sections.description:
Allow customers to add Donation directly from WooCommerce checkout page

Features

  • Allow customers to Donate the amount they wish to donate
  • Allow site admin to use donation management system without effecting existing payment system
  • Easy to use & customize
  • Allow admin to change the text & color for button
  • Allow admin to change position of donate button anywhere on checkout page
  • Works with all free and paid themes

Support

Easy Donation for Woocommerce is developed and supported by IT Path Solutions. If you don’t find an answer of your Query/Doubt/Problem in FAQs or Support forum, feel free to get in touch with us. Click here

Easy Donation for Woocommerce needs your support WordPress thrives on community. And, you are a part of community. So, we kindly request you to support Easy Donation for Woocommerce. and, there are many ways to support, both technical and non-technical.

Different ways to support

  • Report Technical Issues: While developing Easy Donation for Woocommerce, we took utmost care to make sure that we commit bug-free plugin. However, if any issues has been slipped in and you found it, we encourage you to report it. If you are new to community, Click here to find out how to report an issue.

  • Report Documentation Glitches: Documentation is a crucial part of WordPress. So, we take it seriously. If you have noticed any glitches in documentation of Easy Donation for Woocommerce, we encourage you to report it. If you are new to community, Click here to find out how to report an issue.

  • Provide Suggestions: If you have any suggestions for Easy Donation for Woocommerce, we would be grateful if you share it with us. Click here to submit a suggestion.

  • Help in Support forum: Being an active WordPress Community member, you can answer to others’ queries on Support forum. Please visit Support forum of Easy Donation for Woocommerce.

  • Submit Translations: Help localize, submit translations in your language for Easy Donation for Woocommerce on WP translate.

Don’t forget to check out our other plugins developed by IT Path Solutions WordPress Gems

Services And Support

We are committed to top-notch Community and Customer support because we know if you have problem with Easy Donation for Woocommerce, you need a solution as soon as possible.

Our Other Plugins

  1. Contact Form to Any API : Contact form 7 to Any API is most powerful plugin to send cf7 data to any third party services. It can be use to send data to CRM Or any REST API. Easy to use and User friendly settings

  2. Any Post Slider : Any Post Slider is the most powerful WordPress plugin to create sliders. Fully responsive and works with any WordPress theme. To create amazing sliders in minimum time and can be run in any WordPress theme.

  3. SCSS WP Editor : SCSS WP Editor will provide you to add SCSS from your WordPress admin. You just need to add your SCSS and save it. The plugin will Automatically compile the SCSS to CSS with help of SCSSPHP.

  4. Gift Pack for WooCommerce : Let customers add gift packing/wrapping to individual products from product pages. choose your own Gift Pack design directly from the product page with message for Gift Pack. set your own price for gift pack for entire site or even set custom price for each product.

  5. Manifold Google Maps : The most effortless, valuable and effective google map plugin! Effectively make a boundless number of Google Maps and markers.

  6. Advanced Images Gallery With Lightbox : Advanced Images Gallery With Lightbox is the leading plugin for building responsive galleries with Fancy box & Different Layouts

  7. Ultimate Sticky Popup & Widgets : Ultimate Sticky Popup & Widgets is a simple, easy and fully-customizable WordPress plugin used to add popup on fixed position like bottom left, bottom right, left side or right side , top left side & top right side with User friendly Settings.

  8. Any CPT Listing Block : Any Post/CPT Listing allows you to add latest posts or custom posts to your website as section with Gutenberg builder. Display settings allows you to select different style from list or gird view with other settings like limiting of number of posts on front.
sections.installation:
1. Upload easy-donation-for-woocommerce to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. You will find Easy Donation for WooCommerce in your WordPress admin screen.
sections.faq:
Can i change Donation Label ?

Yes

Where i can see donation amount input ?

At checkout page

Can i change Donation button Color & Placement ?

Yes
sections.changelog:

  • Enhancement – Compatibility updated for WordPress 6.3

1.0.2

  • Enhancement – Compatibility updated for WordPress 6.2

1.0.1

  • Added Donation Message Field & Version Update

1.0.0

  • Initial Commit
